snippet: Ryan Braun, the most valuable player of the National League, won his drug case on a procedural point, which has infuriated baseball officials.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that bad feelings are lingering over Milwaukee Brewers outfielder Ryan Braun's victory in fighting his positive drug test and suspension; observes that the National League MVP's winning the case on a procedural point has infuriated MLB officials.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun, the most valuable player of the National League, won his drug case on a procedural point, which has infuriated baseball officials.

headline.seo: Baseball Officials Livid Over Braun’s Victory In Drug Case
headline.main: Bad Feelings Lingering Over Braun’s Victory
headline.print_headline: Bad Feelings Lingering Over Braun’s Victory
